Class YAMLParser

java.lang.Object
pt.up.fe.els2024.parser.FileParser
pt.up.fe.els2024.parser.YAMLParser
public class YAMLParser extends FileParser
YAMLParser is a subclass of FileParser responsible for parsing YAML files.

This class uses the Jackson library's ObjectMapper configured with YAMLFactory to read and convert YAML data into a Map.

  • Method Details

    • readData

      public Map<String,Object> readData(File file) throws IOException
      Reads data from the provided YAML file and converts it into a Map.

      This method uses the Jackson ObjectMapper with YAMLFactory to read the YAML file and convert its contents into a Map. The resulting map represents the hierarchical structure of the YAML data.

      Specified by:
      readData in class FileParser
      Parameters:
      file - the YAML file to read
      Returns:
      a Map representing the parsed YAML content
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during reading the file
